Posts.Content: Hi my breast cancer was found oct o8 surgery nov chemo started dec,my first scan was in the january 09 along with heart and bone scan,a fussy bit was found on my liver so i have had ct scan every 3 months untill feb 2010 it is now 6 monthly,so i think they get treatment started and then all the test fellow once your in the system the appointments will follow.i wish your fiancee well  regards margaret
Posts.Title: Fiancee recently diagnosed

Posts.Content: Hi noj i had 6 weeks of radiotherapy f as advised due to large bust,i finished in june the treatment went well until the last week when my skin broke down not nice and abit of pain when i had to change dressing,but the good news is a week later i had almost healed.i wish you well with your treatment they do look after you well with creams & dressings. margaret xx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy.... advice please
